## chooseScale() function

Flexible scale selector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function chooseScale(theme: Theme, name: string, nominalCount?: number, domain?: [number, number], scaleType?: ScaleType): NominalColorScaleFunction | ContinuousColorScaleFunction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./core.theme.md) | theme instance |
|  name | string | name of the scale type |
|  nominalCount | number | <i>(Optional)</i> if nominal, how many colors to include |
|  domain | \[number, number\] | <i>(Optional)</i> if continuous, input domain (min/max) |
|  scaleType | [ScaleType](./core.scaletype.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> if continuous, scale function (linear, log, quantile) |

<b>Returns:</b>

[NominalColorScaleFunction](./core.nominalcolorscalefunction.md) \| [ContinuousColorScaleFunction](./core.continuouscolorscalefunction.md)
